structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: KRS 82.700 to 82.725 not to be enforced upon agricultural land in unincorporated portion of county.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 82.700 to 82.725 shall not be enforced by a county government upon any property situated in an unincorporated portion of the county that is assessed as agricultural land for tax purposes by the property valuation administrator.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 9, effective June 8, 2011.
